text:
o server: AIX 4330-10
o compiler: ibmcxx.msg.en_US.cmp 3.6.6.0
o apache: 2.0.46
o configure params:./configure --prefix=/home/keeper/apache2 
--enable-modules="headers info mime_magic rewrite status"  --with-port=8080

make breakes with the following error:
"apr_md5.c", line 753.2: 1506-205 (S) #error Configuration error!  crypt_r() 
should have been selected!
make: 1254-004 The error code from the last command is 1.


Stop.
make: 1254-004 The error code from the last command is 1.
creator: keeper@fly.srk.fer.hr
trawick@apache.org
text:
This has been fixed since Apache 2.0.46 was released.

Work-around:

Define a special CPPFLAGS at configure time, like this

CPPFLAGS=-D_THREAD_SAFE ./configure other-options

Sorry!
